sqlMap.select: select A.free_board_id, A.free_board_title, A.free_board_content, B.department_name, C.employee_name, to_char(A.free_board_create_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') free_board_create_date, A.free_board_name from free_board A, department B, employee C where A.department_id = B.department_id and A.employee_id = C.employee_id and A.board_id = #free_board_id#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO FREE_BOARD ( FREE_BOARD_ID , FREE_BOARD_TITLE , DEPARTMENT_ID , FREE_BOARD_CREATE_DATE , FREE_BOARD_NAME , EMPLOYEE_ID , FREE_BOARD_CONTENT ) VALUES ( free_board_seq.nextval, #free_board_title#, #department_id#, TO_DATE(sysdate), '자유', #employee_id#, #free_board_content#)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE FREE_BOARD SET FREE_BOARD_TITLE=#free_board_title# , FREE_BOARD_CONTENT=#free_board_content# WHERE FREE_BOARD_ID=#free_board_id#
